metadata.synopsis: The only business in the Wild West town of Jericho that corrupt sheriff Alex Flood (Dean Martin) doesn't control behind the scenes is the stagecoach owned by tough-willed widow Molly Lang (Jean Simmons) and her right-hand man, Hickman (John McIntire). Former marshal Dolan (George Peppard), recently hired by Lang and Hickman as a driver, wants to stay out of the mess, but when he sees Flood's henchman Yarbrough (Slim Pickens) assault Lang, he steps up to fight the corruption.

reviews: This ugly routine Western is advertised as the kind of old-fashioned one they used to make.
Violent Dean Martin western is so-so.
While Jericho is short on suspense it makes up for it in plenty of action and brisk direction that keep matters hanging together.
